text: Vin skazhe, "Vstupayutʹ z poperednimy spilʹnotamy jinns ta humans u Peklo." Kozhnyy chas hrupa vstupaye, vony vylayayutʹ yikhnyu spadkovu hrupu. Odnoho razu vony ye vsi u tse, ostanniy kozhnyy skazhe poperednʹoho, "Nash Lord, tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu kotri pryzviv do pomylky ny. Dayte yim podvoyuyutʹ retribution Pekla."
